p: Supply and demand are simultaneously estimated via the reduced form using robust standard errors. We estimate 32 parameters in three equations from 561 observations. These are monthly regional observations during 2009–2013 with few, unsystematic gaps. A Bayesian information criterion of 4056 and an R 2 of 32–34% indicate a good model fit. Sections E and F of the S1 File provide technical details on the model and estimation.
